article.title: Support Tool Help
article.content:
• Documentation is on the tool form itself
  • Many tools include "most common" and "full parameter" run-time options
  • Galaxy Resources

Back to Support Hub

Documentation is on the tool form itself

  • Parameters
  • Expected format for input dataset(s)
  • Links to publications and Tool Shed source repositories
  • Tool and wrapper version(s)
  • 3rd party author web sites and documentation

Many tools include "most common" and "full parameter" run-time options

  • Scroll down on the tool form to locate information about expected inputs/outputs, expanded definitions, sample data, example use cases, and graphics.

Galaxy Resources

  • Galaxy Search will locate help across Galaxy's resources.
  • Galaxy Tutorials
  • Galaxy Support FAQs
  • Galaxy Help - current Q\&A
  • Galaxy Biostars - archived Q\&A
